website_summaries.verdict: Inexpensive, and performs just as well as its larger and more expensive counterparts, the 11-inch is the perfect solution if you simply need a small cooking space to serve one or two people.
pros: Ultra-durable plastic lid won’t warp or bend
Tall raised lid and sidewalls for additional cooking space
cons: This small model isn’t designed for creating extra-large meals

website_summaries.verdict: Tops in value. A budget-priced electric skillet that treats you like royalty.

customer_reviews.title: Used frequently 7 years
customer_reviews.text: I bought this July 10, 2011. I use it several times a week to fry meat, fish and/or potatoes. The non-stick coating has started to degrade in a circle where the heating element is. I used to fry at 250°. Later I changed to 300°. I've been very happy with it and am now ordering a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Porter

customer_reviews.title: don't turn the heat abve 350 if you wish to preserve the non-stick surface
customer_reviews.text: i love this little pan. use it every day for bacon and eggs. i am very careful not to turn it above 350 because i don't ant to ruin the non-stck surface.
customer_reviews.author: Tallgirl

customer_reviews.title: All-in-One
customer_reviews.text: I live in a Class C RV full-time so I don't have a lot of counterspace. I needed one pan fits all: and this is it! I cook noodles in it, I make grilled cheese sandwiches, I fry meat....perfect kitchen tool; I really don't need any other pan. It was easy to put together too.
customer_reviews.author: Joanie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size
customer_reviews.text: We bought an electric skillet some years ago when our kids were still around. It was larger than we'd anticipated but during the high summer months when BLTs are on the menu, it was the perfect size. Now our children are grown with homes of their own. We just didn't need such a large cooking surface. I bought this because its size sounded right. It's perfect for the two of us. Plus, it appears to go into the dishwasher -- how great is that? So far it's been a win-win.
customer_reviews.author: Boo

customer_reviews.title: Great Idea, pretty useful skillet but at 6 months ...
customer_reviews.text: Great Idea, pretty useful skillet but at 6 months the non-stick coating has worn off. Even using with relatively low heat and washing with a soft sponge this unit doesn't last long. I replaced it with a Proctor Silex that remarkably seems like a duplicate. After similar careful use it has now developed an electrical problem at the point where the controller plugs in. One of the prongs has deteriorated and it ruins the connection hole of the controller, I have now gone through two controllers that developed this bad connection that reduces heat!
customer_reviews.author: Douglas E. Kerr

customer_reviews.title: Just like the one I have been using for almost 20 ...
customer_reviews.text: Just like the one I have been using for almost 20 years including being made in China. The coating was worn on the old one so food was sticking and was hard to clean. I have done fish, stir fry, eggs, etc. on the new skillet with no sticking and easy cleaning. I would recommend putting some thread locker on the side handle screws since they get loose on a regular basis.
customer_reviews.author: JWB

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Electric Skillet
customer_reviews.text: *Genuine review, no compensation received in any form* I LOVE this skillet. My last one took a crap after 8 yrs of (heavy) use so I bought a new one. I was thrilled to find it was the same make/model and they haven’t changed a thing. But then, why would you mess with perfection? The design is simple and effective. It heats up quickly and always cooks my food wonderfully. Could not recommend more! 5/5
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.McKoy

customer_reviews.title: WORTHLESS FRY PAN
customer_reviews.text: I received it to ASSEMBLE. The problem is there are no screws to assemble it. Now what do I do??? PLEASE HELP. It is disgusting that a buyer has to go through all of the headache in buying a skillet. I have NO PRINTER TO PRINT A RETURN LABEL.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great Skillet
customer_reviews.text: We just stayed in a cabin that had no stove. This electric skillet was a life saver. It heats up fast, cooks evenly and holds alot. I really like it. I live in Texas and like the fact that I can cook without heating up the kitchen with a stove. If you can cook it in a pan or griddle, you can cook it in this.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Clements

customer_reviews.title: Missing part
customer_reviews.text: I bought this skillet a couple of months before Christmas as I like to do my shopping early. I gave it to my Dad December 25. He tried to put it together last week and said there is a piece missing. I can’t send it back because the return time was at the end of October and I’m leery of getting another one. I may just go to a department store and get one. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Matlock

customer_reviews.title: Missing part
customer_reviews.text: Only 3 of 4 screws to attach legs to base were included. Unless I head to a hardware store, I am unable to use product. It seems quality control missed inspection of this item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: I cooked a roast..simmered it for a few hours with veggies. When I washed the pan, I noticed the non-stick stuff came off in a circle, where the heating element is, I guess. Not happy at all about that. With I had kept the box.
customer_reviews.author: D. Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Presto 06620 11-inch Electric Skillet
customer_reviews.text: It is the perfect Electric Skillet for me; a bit smaller than the average and is great when storing as it is portable. The Presto Skillet cooks very well; the temperature dial I choose is ideal for the food I am cooking. I like the skillet and the cover for its very lightness and ease. Good product. Zoe
customer_reviews.author: Gladys

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Open the box, gave it a good washing and fired it up. I tried it out making fried chicken. It is a smaller skillet (11 in), perfect for cooking for three. One half chicken fits in the skillet just right. Temperature was even all over the pan, and clean up was easy - no scrubbing needed. My old skillet was failing - temperature was not up to where it needed to be, and I almost over cooked the meat this time. I didn't take into account that the heat on the new skillet was where it should be. Meal turned out just right!
customer_reviews.author: Diane of the Desert

customer_reviews.title: good in small spaces
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for something we could cook with in an RV. After reading a bunch of reviews we selected this skillet. Although 1/2 the size of the normal skillets we cooked breakfast for 4 while camping with little issue. Glad we got it. Works well, cleans easily.
customer_reviews.author: Pat O

customer_reviews.title: Great pan, perfect for camping!
customer_reviews.text: Great pan! I haven’t used an electric skillet in years, but bought this so I could still cook without heating up my kitchen this hot summer. It’s perfect! The first one I bought, about 30 years ago, was for camping. Perfect for cooking ANTHING on a picnic table (as long as we had a hookup, of course). And cleanup was simple ... just heat up water in it, add some dish soap, and voila! Because of the depth, we could wash our dishes in it and wash out the pan at the same time! Perfect for our little pop up camper!
customer_reviews.author: boisbrule

customer_reviews.title: Just What She Wanted
customer_reviews.text: My wife wanted a new electric fry pan, since our old one is something like 40 years old! It still works, but she wanted one to use in the motor home, and one for the kitchen. I liked the looks of this Presto, and the size and power (wattage) were very similar to our old fry pan. It was easy enough to attach the legs. It has a very slight wobble, but once you put a pound or two in it, it quits wobbling. The first use produced an odd new-appliance odor, but it didn't affect the flavor of the food. Now she gets to decide which goes where!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin D.

customer_reviews.title: Good cookware!
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a similar electric fryer that I have from 20 yrs ago. Could not find it (different brand) any more and this came the closest to it. We wish we had bought the larger size but this one is OK. We don't really like the non-metal lid nor the height with the use of the cover but it did do what we wanted it for at the time. Large Rump roast does not fit as we would have liked.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Rodocker

customer_reviews.title: Best small appliance in my kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this skillet for about 10 years, and I still use it almost everyday. I love it and I would recommend it to anyone. It's easy to clean and very reliable heatwise. I can bake and it using the rack as well as fry or saute. Yes, the inside of the lid does yellow a bit over time, but that has zero bearing on its effectiveness. This is one of my favorite appliances, and I am so happy that I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria L Van Ackeren

customer_reviews.title: Best little pan in the world!!!
customer_reviews.text: This pan is wonderful for single people. It is the perfect size for cooking individual meals. I use this 5 out of 7 nights a week. Also it is even temperature cooking and a breeze to cleanup. Love this pan!!! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Carol VA Girl

customer_reviews.title: LOVE Presto Products
customer_reviews.text: Once again, Presto has delivered an economically priced totally functional product. Took this little skillet on a road trip and was so happy I did. It heats up quickly and is super easy to clean. To prevent scratches, I use silicone utensils when cooking. After cooking, I use a paper towel to wipe out any excess food/sauce/oils. I then use a soft sponge with warm soapy water to clean. Compact and easy to pack.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Lover

customer_reviews.title: Great extra for every kitchen.
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I wanted, during my kitchen remodel and then in my trailer when camping. The box arrived in curious shape, dented corner, lots of retaping to seal the box. I keep my things nice so very disappointed that the lid is scratched. I don’t have time to return it so just have to live with it. The 4star is for the delivery condition.
customer_reviews.author: cgarr

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement for a Presto electric skillet that I had had for about thirty years. It is actually better than my old one. It cooks hotter and quicker, so I had to adjust my cooking. I think maybe the temperature on my old one wasn't working as well as this one does. It is just the right size. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this skillet several times a week since I received it, It has worked perfectly every time. My last electric skillet lasted for about 40 years and quit working. Also that brand is no longer made, so I choose this one. Over a great product.
customer_reviews.author: John Mann

customer_reviews.title: For the money a good buy.
customer_reviews.text: As an electric skillet in this price range it is of good quality, does a good job of cooking although thermostat not what my old one was (no slow steady simmer, shuts down to barely nothing then up to a full boil), cooking surface actually measures about 9 1/2 or so inches not 11. It cleans easily. Also it has an OFF SETTING, VIP so you are not having to pull the plug. All in all a good bang for your buck BUT for my next one I will step up and buy a Cuisinart for considerably more money.
customer_reviews.author: Josephine B.

customer_reviews.title: Glue skillet alternative
customer_reviews.text: I use this for crafts as an electric glue skillet it works great. It heats up and melts a ton of glue very quickly. The metal pot is separated from the handles but they still do get warm. I love it. It was a great purchase for my craft business “wreathlings”
customer_reviews.author: JennyDang Tha God

customer_reviews.title: Semi truck friendly=)
customer_reviews.text: I bought this skillet to help with cooking on my semi. This skillet can do it all and does not take up any space in my truck. This is all I need. I love it. Versatile and easy to clean. Now I don’t have to carry so many different appliance on the truck. Awesome product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for Ice house / RV
customer_reviews.text: This arrived on Thursday, went ice fishing Friday and fried fish in it Saturday. Just the size I was hoping would work and it did!!! I purposely bought this because it didn't have a glass lid which could get broke transporting around in the RV. Great product, heats evenly and accurately.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah L. Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Electric Skillet
customer_reviews.text: This electric skillet is much like one I had years ago so I knew the roomy dome would be pleasing. After using it a while there have been no problems at all, it heats evenly, and I recommend it to anyone who needs a skillet this size which serves up to 6 or possibly 7 and doesn't care that the lid isn't see-through.
customer_reviews.author: Jude Cowell

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I use these as my main cooking appliance and I got through about one a year (I replace it when the teflon begins to peel). I've tried a few different models and I do like this one because it is relatively compact and doesn't eat up a lot of counter space. Being smaller, it heats up quicker too. The plastic lid is both good and bad. Good because it is much lighter than glass and much easier to clean. Bad because you can't see the food as it's cooking. I would expect it to last about a year and if they are still making these, I will replace it with the same model.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great size.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for me. I'm disabled and use this on my way in table n my kitchen. Clean up is easy as well.
customer_reviews.author: unauthorized

customer_reviews.title: I thought the lid was metal but it seems to be plastic !
customer_reviews.text: This pan arrived without the handles attached, so be prepared to get a phillips-head screwdriver and attach the parts; also the lid appears to be some kind of plastic, where I thought it would be a metal lid. That being said, I have used the skillet twice now and it cooked perfectly and was easy to clean so there's that !
customer_reviews.author: Laura Ford

customer_reviews.title: Heats evenly
customer_reviews.text: This works great for camping where size is important. It is deep enough to make skillet meals.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn_Nordstrom

customer_reviews.title: Good price. Good little skillet.
customer_reviews.text: Good little skillet. Perfect for a dormroom/small apartment/RV. Not super high powered, but enough to flip 2 small pancakes, cook scrambled eggs or saute onions.
customer_reviews.author: Grh1

customer_reviews.title: cooks evenly and very easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: liked everything about it......sizd construction of heats well just the right size
customer_reviews.author: Elaine E. Wanko

customer_reviews.title: Wrong lid handle
customer_reviews.text: I like it but I got wrong a lid handle. Please send me the lid handle. ====== It has been replaced so quickly. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Eunhye Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great for steaming corn on the cob!
customer_reviews.text: So useful for many things. I put a round rack in, add water below the level of the rack, add several ears of corn, cover and turn on high. In no time the corn is steamed and delicious! The high lid allows for more corn. Can warm up leftovers by steaming too.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Brayton

customer_reviews.title: Everyone should have one
customer_reviews.text: I repeat, everyone should have one of these, especially in warm weather! Handles everything from searing tuna steak to fixung quick breakfast scrambles. Just great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to control, accurate, reliable heat in place of your stove...
customer_reviews.text: I avoid my ceramic cooktop whenever possible, in favor of this handy electric skillet. It heats up quickly and maintains the right temperature so my food cooks just the way Iike it. I use it all the time and I love it. Easy to clean too!
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Great little skillet!
customer_reviews.text: This skillet is the perfect size; not too big, but still holds plenty for cooking for multiple people or just one! I use it outdoors in my screened Arizona room so I have plenty of ventilation, and, as any cook knows, when cooking meat, fish or chicken, it makes a mess of the stove and smells up the house for hours. It is also lightweight and very easy to clean! Just unplug and wash in the sink! The nonstick surface on the skillet and lid cleans very easily. Sweet!!
customer_reviews.author: kat erickson

customer_reviews.title: nice little skillet
customer_reviews.text: this thing is nice but you get what you pay for, mine has some bubbles in the paint of the lid that will probably flake off someday soon then it will have bare metal and start rusting. only had it two months
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: is a good size for many chores
customer_reviews.text: A competent workhorse of an appliance-heats quickly, is a good size for many chores, easy cleanup.Saves messing up the entire glass cooktop of my range, can often be wiped clean, or a quick trip thru soapy dishwater takes care of it. Would like it to come with a glass lid-otherwise happy and satisfied with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Hart

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I got this because it’s smaller than the one I have. I love it, fried eggs are a breeze in this thing. I think I have used it every day since I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Basic Electric skillet
customer_reviews.text: I wanted just a basic electric skillet for a house of two. My previous one cooked way to hot. This one is basic but cooks great and is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: V. Hess

customer_reviews.title: Nice little skillet.
customer_reviews.text: Great little skillet. Large enough to fit a whole cut up chicken if I wanted, but not a big foot print for limited counter space. Deep enough that iutt holds a lot. Heats as evenly as can expected for an electric skillet.
customer_reviews.author: Lea Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Electric Skillet for Two
customer_reviews.text: Based on other reviews I purchased this electric skillet and I wasn't disappointed! It is the perfect size for two, it heats up quickly, and is easy to clean. I also like the heating element under the handle versus sticking out from the front. I couldn't be more pleased. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great starter electric skillet!
customer_reviews.text: I use this thing every chance I get. It works really well and is dishwasher safe so easy clean up! It's the perfect size for me to cook for my husband, our toddler, and myself.
customer_reviews.author: Safire Rhoades

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: This replaced an old one that just quit working. The new one works great. Very good temperature control and easy to clean. Higly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: elvato

customer_reviews.title: Excellent electric skillet.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely. The skillet is everything we hoped for. I researched and read reviews. We made the right decision. We are not disappointed. Would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: The skillet arrived on time and well packaged. It is just the right size for small to medium dishes and heats up great. The addition of a cover makes it even more useful and helps to keep the kitchen clean when frying.
customer_reviews.author: Jill D.

customer_reviews.title: You can always depend on Presto!
customer_reviews.text: We have had several of this brand and size electric skillet. Great quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: T. D.

customer_reviews.title: I love using this for quick cleanup
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Love the size so I can slip it into the cupboard. Easy to clean, easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: My mom freaking loves it
customer_reviews.text: My mom goes on and on about how awesome this is. Easy to put together, easy to clean and easy to use etc. She really won’t shut up 🤦🏾‍♀️ But it makes her happy so I’m happy.
customer_reviews.author: Nika

customer_reviews.title: it's little hard to clean.
customer_reviews.text: it does what it suppose to do but it's little hard to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Sh1990

customer_reviews.title: presto skillet
customer_reviews.text: Seems to cook too high even on its lowest setting; otherwise OK
customer_reviews.author: Ann E. Prestage

customer_reviews.title: Little but great
customer_reviews.text: This product is a perfect size for 2 people-It is easy to cook with and flexible to perform many duties-We love it !!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This has been extremely useful. I am very happy
customer_reviews.text: I temporarily don't have use of a stove. This has been extremely useful. I can brown chicken or cook rice with the skillet. Easy to control temperature. Great deal for $20
customer_reviews.author: 2tag

customer_reviews.title: The best one
customer_reviews.text: Bought one with glass lid & threw it away & bought a aluminum lid one
customer_reviews.author: DENNIS L.

customer_reviews.title: Came quickly & A very nice made electric skillet
customer_reviews.text: I love the size 11-inch and there is not a thing I don't like about it.. Well made, would recommend to a friend or anyone. Such a good price,
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Lee Winters

customer_reviews.title: Smells
customer_reviews.text: The lid is plastic...Smells like burning/warm plastic while the lid is on. No plastic smell while it's off.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny P.

customer_reviews.title: The entire skillet heats evenly so food cooks the same no matter where it is in the skillet!
customer_reviews.text: Everything but mostly the fact that it heats evenly over the entire surface so you food all cooks the same. I have hunted a long time for this feature and am so glad I found this one!
customer_reviews.author: NH in SD

customer_reviews.title: We love this skillet
customer_reviews.text: My husband does most of the cooking and he loves this skillet, I like it because I do the clean up and this pan is very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Halverson

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for 2 of us. Have used many times already. Even hear so no hot spots.
customer_reviews.author: clittle

customer_reviews.title: Love this skillet
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Presto 11-inch electric skillet. I do almost all of my frying in this skillet and love it. My other one lasted several years and was happy to see that I could find another one like it. I always put the skillet on the top rack in my dishwasher and the lid down below and this helps the life of the skillet. I cook at least 4 times a week using this skillet so I do recommend this to anyone that cooks. It saves my stove and grease that splatters. Also, good seller and fast in mailing. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: A. Ladner

customer_reviews.title: Great size for singles and couples
customer_reviews.text: I replaced a very old electric skillet of my mom’s that was probably an electric hazard and I needed one that was a smaller size. It worked perfectly, really happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for camping.
customer_reviews.text: Cooks stuff up fast, so there's more time to do other stuff I'd rather do.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Reed

customer_reviews.title: Fryer
customer_reviews.text: The electric fry pan arrived in good condition and there’s no damage
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Perfect for cooking bacon. I live either in a tiny house or in a hot climate so I plug it in outside and it is great.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Chun

customer_reviews.title: Takes a little to get used to.
customer_reviews.text: I followed the guide exactly as stated and the food burned. It was a recipe printed in a book specificly for electric skillets. So it will take some time to get used to.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: Best cooker i bought for my semi. Cooks anything and clean up fast. East to store.
customer_reviews.author: Lyn

customer_reviews.title: Enjoy our square skillet.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this square electric skillet to use in our trailer. It works just liked we had hoped. This size skillet fits our trailer just right.
customer_reviews.author: James Connor

customer_reviews.title: Presto 06620 11-inch electric skillet
customer_reviews.text: Works great and clean up has been easy. I'm happy with this purchase, made stir fry in this, both chicken and shrimp.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good size for me.
customer_reviews.text: Does what I wanted it to do. A little uneven cooking but fine for me.
customer_reviews.author: Robert N.

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: sweeet little pan, enough room for breakfast for 2 and cooking a chicken with all the fixins
customer_reviews.author: donna ladley

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My mom has used this for years. So of course I use it too. I use my in place of the stovetop and it’s an easy clean up. Good quality product. Dishwasher safe also.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Hood

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this piece for over a year and this has been excessively used as it is my favorite to cook on and perfect size. I would so recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: nice for two people
customer_reviews.text: I fry just about everything in it. I is so easy to clean up with just hot soapy water.
customer_reviews.author: Mickie Lou

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and Portable Cooking
customer_reviews.text: We use to cook in the summer on our cruising boat instead of the stove with its large heat footprint and power consumption. Quick to heat and even surface temperature. Quick clean up. Light weight.
customer_reviews.author: john mccarley

customer_reviews.title: coating started coming off around the heat ring within a month
customer_reviews.text: it works. but the antistick started coming off right away
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: The nonstick came off in a circle after just a few months of use.Terrible!
customer_reviews.author: G.G.

customer_reviews.title: Reliable
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was extremely fast. Skillet is reliable and works as expected. This was a replacement for an exact model that was used for the last 10 years.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: This is my third one in a period of 4 ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my third one in a period of 4 years and I have not one complaint. Works consistantly and is used daily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this pan
customer_reviews.text: I love this pan. It fries wonderful keeps the oil a steady temp. great for hotdishes, no oven needed. It just works great and a great price also.
customer_reviews.author: Kim M Rieck

customer_reviews.title: Rather have a glass cover.
customer_reviews.text: Works fine but do wish it had a glass cover.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Mostly we use it to fry beignets or other foods that require a certain temperature. When I don't want to watch the electric stove real close, then something does not get to dark.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Mowry

customer_reviews.title: Best deal we found
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my parents for part of their Christmas present. They wanted a little larger skillet with a lid to help with big family dinners. We checked everywhere from JCPenney to even nasty Walmart. This one had the best price and was a brand that I had actually heard of. It has worked great for them so far, but the outside does get super hot so keep little fingers away.
customer_reviews.author: cassieb

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The frying pan works well for meat, 4 French toast, and grilled sandwiches.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: But why make the screws too tight to take off to install the legs?
customer_reviews.text: Love this skillet - it's just the right size for my household and I'm replacing one that was worn. My only complaint -- screws must be removed from the bottom of the skillet and used to install the legs. Three of the four screws came off easily -- the fourth one is still in the skillet and I can't get it unscrewed, so I am going to have to ask somebody to help me. This is very annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: The high top lid was good as well
customer_reviews.text: Old pan died and was tickled that I got one that looked small but held just as much. The high top lid was good as well. The element that controls the temperature works well. My old element was irregular in temperature.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Great Skillet!
customer_reviews.text: We love this electric Skillet. This purchase is for a second one to take along in our new Airstream when we are "camping". It is a nice size and easy to keep clean. The price is also really good too.
customer_reviews.author: quiltangel

customer_reviews.title: It's convenient and fast
customer_reviews.text: I like it, I'm using it for lots of cooking: fish, chicken, vegetables, pasta, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Georges Agenor

customer_reviews.title: fast and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I've had this skillet for a few months now. I found it heats up fast and the non-stick coating makes things easy to clean. I've made omelets with cheese and the cheese just wipes out of the unit. Water heats fast. With the lid on, pork chops and chicken breasts cook easily. Definitely, a good, versatile skillet. Perfect size for one person.
customer_reviews.author: J. Paterson

customer_reviews.title: Good for cooking, but not great for keep things at low warming temps.
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice electric skillet. But, the lowest setting is a bit higher than I need. Wish I could turn it down more. I use it to keep gelatin warm and not cook.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Delmar

customer_reviews.title: Use it a lot.
customer_reviews.text: I just love it! Easy to use. Nothing sticks down. I even make decent pizza in it! I love to cook and really didn't expect much from this pan. I have been surprised to find that I am reaching for it all of the time. Eggs don't stick down when you scramble them. Very easy to clean up after use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: size was perfect for my need, works great, price was right.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Houde

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: Got this to replace one my parents had that was very similar to it (an older version, I believe) that had started to flake after all the years of use. They are very satisfied with it. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Akins

customer_reviews.title: Nice and lightweights
customer_reviews.text: Gift to replace my moms ancient one that broke. Nice and lightweights
customer_reviews.author: c

customer_reviews.title: So far so good! I've used it twice where it cooked evenly ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! I've used it twice where it cooked evenly and cleaned up easily. It seems like it will be around for a while. Bought it for a cooking option when camping. Only brought it on one trip but forgot it on the next trip. I had a real old one before I used it to death but I think I can tell this will be another old one that will be around for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: We have used one of these and like it. When it needs replacing we will order another.
customer_reviews.author: Beula

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: For the price this skillet is great. Easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Cathe N.

product_meta.title: Presto 06620 11-Inch Electric Skillet,Black/White
product_meta.description: Size:11"Fries, grills, stews and more! Accommodates large roasts, hams and poultry. Innovative EverNu cover won't dent, warp, bend or peel. DiamondCoat deluxe nonstick finish inside and out. Dishwasher safe with heat control removed. 120 volts, 60 Hz only
feature_bullets: Roasts, fries, grills, stews, bakes, makes casseroles for four people
Control Master heat control automatically maintains proper cooking temperature
Innovative plastic EverNu cover wont dent, warp, peel, or bend
Deluxe nonstick surface for stick-free cooking, easy cleaning
Product Built to North American Electrical Standards
